sourcesContent:
const header = {
  // homepage: 'https://pooja735.github.io/portfolio', // optional
  // title: 'PV.', // optional
}

const about = {
  name: 'Pooja Valleti',
  role: 'AI & ML Enthusiast | Full Stack Developer | Data Science & SQL',
  description:
    'AI and Full Stack Developer passionate about solving real-world problems using technology. Experienced in building intelligent applications, virtual interfaces, and scalable web platforms. Enthusiastic about learning and applying ML, NLP, and system design.',
  resume: 'https://drive.google.com/file/d/128ph-KuL7bXoHO2Xda13zny3smnIwKxK/view',
  social: {
    linkedin: 'https://www.linkedin.com/in/valleti-pooja-545a36242/',
    github: 'https://github.com/pooja735',
  },
}

const projects = [
  {
    name: 'TechStore E-commerce Website',
    description:
      'Full-stack MERN-based e-commerce platform with secure authentication, product catalog, cart, order tracking, and OpenAI-powered chatbot for instant support on shipping, payments, and more.',
    stack: ['React', 'Node.js', 'MongoDB', 'OpenAI API', 'JavaScript'],
    sourceCode: 'https://github.com/pooja735/full-stack-e-commerce-with-chatbot.git',
    livePreview: '', // optional
  },
  {
    name: 'Gesture-Controlled Virtual Mouse',
    description:
      'Contactless mouse interface using MediaPipe and Pybind11 for real-time gesture-based control like cursor movement, click, scroll, and drag-and-drop.',
    stack: ['MediaPipe', 'OpenCV', 'Pybind11', 'TensorFlow'],
    sourceCode: 'https://github.com/pooja735/Hand-Gesture-Control.git',
    livePreview: '', // optional
  },
  {
    name: 'MedMaster',
    description:
      'Personalized Medical Recommendation System using ML and Flask. Provides disease prediction and health tips while ensuring user privacy and security.',
    stack: ['Python', 'Machine Learning', 'Flask'],
    sourceCode: 'https://github.com/pooja735/MedMaster.git',
    livePreview: '', // optional
  },
]

const skills = [
  'Python',
  'C',
  'Java',
  'HTML',
  'CSS',
  'SQL',
  'JavaScript',
  'React',
  'Node.js',
  'MongoDB',
  'MySQL',
  'Oracle DB',
  'Pandas',
  'Matplotlib',
  'Mediapipe',
  'Scikit-learn',
  'GitHub',
  'Microsoft Excel',
]

const contact = {
  email: 'poojavalleti04@gmail.com',
}

const experience = [
  {
    title: 'Full Stack Developer Intern',
    company: 'TechCorp Solutions',
    period: 'Jan 2024 - Present',
    description: 'Developed and maintained web applications using React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Implemented RESTful APIs and improved application performance by 40%.',
    technologies: ['React', 'Node.js', 'MongoDB', 'JavaScript', 'Git']
  },
  {
    title: 'Data Science Intern',
    company: 'AI Innovations Lab',
    period: 'Jun 2023 - Dec 2023',
    description: 'Built machine learning models for predictive analytics. Developed data pipelines and visualization dashboards using Python and SQL.',
    technologies: ['Python', 'Machine Learning', 'SQL', 'Pandas', 'Scikit-learn']
  },
  {
    title: 'Software Developer',
    company: 'StartUp Ventures',
    period: 'Mar 2023 - May 2023',
    description: 'Contributed to the development of a gesture-controlled virtual mouse application using MediaPipe and OpenCV.',
    technologies: ['Python', 'MediaPipe', 'OpenCV', 'Computer Vision']
  }
]

const education = [
  {
    degree: 'Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science',
    institution: 'University of Technology',
    period: '2020 - 2024',
    gpa: '3.8/4.0',
    description: 'Specialized in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. Completed capstone project on medical recommendation systems.'
  },
  {
    degree: 'High School Diploma',
    institution: 'Science Academy',
    period: '2018 - 2020',
    gpa: '95%',
    description: 'Focused on Mathematics and Computer Science. Participated in various coding competitions and hackathons.'
  }
]

export { header, about, projects, skills, contact, experience, education }
